name: Digital Blood [Demo]
description:
Do you like computers? Do you like murder? Do you like guns? Do you hate anime?

Well then Digital Blood is the perfect Doom asset flip for you.

It's a game/mod made by Techaddicted using the GZdoom engine and its going to be releasing for free.

Right now you can play a free demo of the game to see how  good  its getting and how to make it better.

You play as a computer and gun enthousiast called Chex Hexen.

Chex is the coolest and most badass computer nerd in the world.

But all of a sudden there's a conflict within the story.

His pc got infected by the WAC virus (oh no!).

Chex knew he shouldn't have let Coomer install all that "art" on his PC.

Chex with his guns transported himself inside of his computer using his self made "Atom Digitizer 69000".

His mission is to take down the WAC virus, before the WAC virus takes over his PC.

There's one small problem though, a lot of his weapons ended up in different locations on his computer.

Will Chex be able to save his computer? Your skill depends on it.
